arts.ttl: Jess Thorup: “We can enjoy this day”
arts.sum: Augsburg’s coach is delighted after setting a new club record.

arts.ttl: Niko Kovac: “You can't win a Bundesliga game like that”
arts.sum: Dortmund’s coach criticized his team’s performance after the club’s tenth defeat of the season.

arts.ttl: Emré Can and Nico Schlotterbeck candid after Dortmund defeat: “We’re not a top-six team.”
arts.sum: BVB captain Emré Can addressed the hail of whistles from the home supporters following Saturday's torrid home loss. Dortmund defender Nico Schlotterbeck echoed his skipper's sentiments.

arts.ttl: Sebastian Kehl cagey Julian Brandt’s Dortmund future: “A difficult situation.”
arts.sum: BVB sporting director Sebastian Kehl appeared skeptical when discussing the future of German national team attacker Julian Brandt on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Jurgen Klopp names the THREE stars he regrets not signing while at Borussia Dortmund - including a Man City midfielder and a Reds forward
arts.sum: Jurgen Klopp has named three footballing superstars he regrets not signing while at Borussia Dortmund - before they all went on to bigger things in the upper echelons of European football.

arts.ttl: Post-Match Reaction: Dortmund Drop Undroppable Points
arts.sum: Augsburg came into the game as a defensive powerhouse and showed their stripes against BVB. Dortmund’s run in to the end of the season includes games against pretty much every team they need to get ahead of.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Resilient Augsburg Hold on to Beat Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: BVB couldn’t break down Augsburg’s stout defense, missing out on a huge opportunity to gain ground on the top four. Dortmund knocked at Augsburg’s door throughout the second half, but they could not turn their dominance on the ball into many concrete chances.

arts.ttl: Augsburg stun Borussia Dortmund with another defensive masterclass
arts.sum: Augsburg secure a stunning win at Borussia Dortmund, with Jeffrey Gouweleeuw's first-half header proving decisive in a match in which the dominant hosts became the latest side to come up short against the Bavarian outfit's brilliant defence. Julian Brandt was particularly active, but despite Dortmund's efforts, Augsburg's defence, marshalled by the impressive Gouweleeuw, stood firm.

arts.ttl: Match Thread: Borussia Dortmund Look to Extend Unbeaten Run Against Augsburg
arts.sum: Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments. Streaming: ESPN+ (US), Sky Go (Germany)

arts.ttl: BVB demand €15 million for out-of-favor US international
arts.sum: Giovanni Reyna’s days at Borussia Dortmund are numbered. Sky now reveal BVB’s asking price to offload the US international.
